content: Your line is open. Your line is open. And don't get me wrong, I really wish View and Crown well, I actually wanted them to do well because View and Crown actually act as a great reference point for customers of our SPD smart technology, which has superb performance and has proven durability in tens of thousands of cars, boats, aircraft, and architectural applications. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open.
